price: 59. Qiisa usuk Yalla hinnaay, yallih baxa hinna naqasuy kah nemqe akke waytek (nubuwwannul) kaadu israa-iil xayloh Yallih dudda elle geyan ceelalloo kee astá kaa abne.
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا عَبۡدٌ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ مَثَلٗا لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā ʿabdun anʿamnā ʿalayhi wajaʿalnāhu mathalan libanī is'rāīla
